snippet.title: Mortal Shell The Virtuous Cycle DLC - Official Teaser Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
In this new teaser trailer, developer Cold Symmetry reveals the upcoming Mortal Shell The Virtuous Cycle DLC. The trailer confirmed it will be coming soon to PS4, PS5, Xbox Series X, Xbox One, and PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
